known_issues: Deployment process created Version 32 despite user instruction; user requests revert to Version 29 only.

existing_features.title: Revert the deployed application to frontend Version 29 and ensure the deployed build reports Version 29 (no Version 30/31/32 artifacts or labels remain in the deployed output).

new_feature_requests.summary: Revert deployment to Version 29 and do not create/publish any versions other than 29

projectName: Revert deployment to Version 29 only (block any other version)
